Properties

ContentRect

Gets the content rectangle in screen coordinates, excluding scrollbars.

public virtual Rect ContentRect { get; }

Property Value

Rect

HScrollbarHeight

Gets the height of the horizontal scrollbar if visible, otherwise 0.

public virtual float HScrollbarHeight { get; }

Property Value

float

Gets the maximum height of the horizontal scrollbar, including margins.

public virtual float HScrollbarMaxHeight { get; }

HasHorizontalScrollbar()

Returns true if the horizontal scrollbar is visible.

public virtual bool HasHorizontalScrollbar()

Returns

bool

True if horizontal scrollbar is visible, otherwise false.

Returns

bool

True if vertical scrollbar is visible, otherwise false.

RenderContent(RendererTwoDimentional, Action<Rect>)

Renders the content within the panel, applying clipping and drawing scrollbars.

public void RenderContent(RendererTwoDimentional gfx, Action<Rect> renderContentCallback)

Parameters

gfx RendererTwoDimentional

The 2D renderer to use.

renderContentCallback Action<Rect>

A callback to render the content. Receives the content rectangle as a parameter.

RenderScrollbarsV3Themed(RendererCommon, OnixClientThemeV3?)

Renders the scrollbars using the V3 theme.

public void RenderScrollbarsV3Themed(RendererCommon gfx, OnixClientThemeV3? theme = null)

Parameters

gfx RendererCommon

The renderer to use.

theme OnixClientThemeV3

The theme to use. If null, uses the default client theme.

Update(ClickType, Vec2, int, float)

Updates the scrollbar panel logic. Should be called every frame with the latest mouse input.

public void Update(InputKey.ClickType click, Vec2 mousePosition, int scrollCount, float deltaTime)

Parameters

click InputKey.ClickType

The mouse click type.

mousePosition Vec2

The current mouse position.

scrollCount int

The scroll wheel delta.

deltaTime float

The time since the last update, in seconds.
